programme.title: Brussels, My Love?
programme.desc: From the economy to the climate and the EU's role in world affairs, this talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly-tinged but ultimately feel-good comedy starring Tom Hanks as a grumpy misanthrope who spends his time badgering people into following society's rules. But why is he like this?

programme.title: Nuns on the Run
programme.desc: (1990) Eric Idle and Robbie Coltrane star as small-time crooks who accidentally steal 1m and are forced to hide in a convent to escape both the police and the mob.

programme.title: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
programme.desc: (2021) Jessica Chastain puts in a barnstorming performance as the glitzy televangelist in the kind of real-life rise and fall that just seems made for the movies. With Andrew Garfield.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: (1957) Gripping drama with Robert Beatty. An expert team races against the clock to save a six-year-old boy who's been trapped in a seemingly impregnable bank vault.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: (1954) Tough western. A cavalry doctor (Robert Francis) discovers a Native American tribe is dying of malaria, but his by-the-book captain (Phil Carey) refuses to allow their treatment.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: (1957) Drama with Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon. Two friends agree to smuggle a mysterious European woman across the border, but she soon has them at each other's throats.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: (1993) Romantic comedy with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. A bereaved man gets another chance at love when his son puts him on a radio talk show.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: (1999) Drama with Tom Hanks and Michael Clarke Duncan. Strange events occur when a man convicted of raping and murdering two young girls arrives on death row in a Louisiana prison.

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: Web of the Dreamweaver: Animated adventures. The gang investigate the mystery of the Dreamweaver, an evil wizard who is causing citizens to destroy the things they love the most.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: There Wolf: Animated adventure series. The gang rushes Scooby to an animal hospital when he suddenly falls ill, but things go from bad to worse when a werewolf goes on the rampage.

programme.title: What's New, Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: It's All Greek to Scooby: Children's animated series about a group of teenage sleuths and their cowardly dog. A medallion Shaggy wears causes a mythical creature to come to life.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: The Scooby of a Thousand Faces!: While on holiday in Greece, Mystery Inc. gets caught in a one-on-one battle between a Minotaur and Wonder Woman.

programme.title: The Big Bake: Halloween
programme.desc: Camp Vamp: Larger-than-life baking competition. Brad Smith raises the stakes as the teams impress the judges with cakes from a vampire summer camp.

programme.title: Sam and Billie: Sister Act
programme.desc: Reality series. Sam and Billie are reunited in Dubai, but Billie is struggling with her health and Sam's attempt to host a yacht party with Amanda Holden is put into jeopardy.

programme.title: The Only Way is Essex
programme.desc: During a big group dinner, Ferne's big mouth gets her into trouble again, while Lucy is shocked to hear that Dan may not be as squeaky clean as she thought.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Potomac
programme.desc: Rum-ble in the Jungle: Reality series. Wendy takes the group to Panama City for some fun with rum, and a few of the ladies unload on Mia as the festivities continue.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
programme.desc: Reunion Part Three: US reality series. The 13th series reunion concludes as the New Jersey men have a ferocious face-off and Teresa's and Joe's tempers boil over.

programme.title: Dinner Date
programme.desc: Calvin: Culinary dating show. Calvin from Greater Manchester chooses three women to date based on their temptingly tasty menus. Will Calvin and his chosen lady find lasting love?

programme.desc: Reality series. Sam and Billie open up about past traumas, Billie's health issues continue as the sisters undergo biological age testing, and Greg celebrates the big 4-0.

programme.title: The Only Way Is Essex
